QuestData.Title: Just One Thing
QuestData.Description:
You are just in time! Chance be high dat my blood was de next to spill.
It is my fault we stopped here. Our team wanted to head back.
Crawgs are de trouble, you see. De sanguinous birth of dese young be corrupted by cruel training. They are quite impressionable and dey will follow with just a little enticement.
Capture the attention of one of de little squirmy ones nearby. We will see if my theory is correct.
